sentences.en: As we have noted above, though, large rocks make fast interplanetary voyages very infrequently.
sentences.cn: 不过, 前面曾经提及, 在行星之间快速飞行的大石块相当罕见.

sentences.en: By definition , interplanetary travel is travel between bodies in a given star system.
sentences.cn: 星系旅行是指在给定的行星系统内在不同星体间的旅行.

sentences.en: For interplanetary exploration, Earth observation, reconnaissance, meteorological studies of small satellites are also under development.
sentences.cn: 用于星际探测 、 对地观测 、 侦察 、 气象研究的小卫星也在发展之中.

sentences.en: Geometry of an interplanetary CME on October 29,2003 deduced from cosmic rays.
sentences.cn: 根据宇宙射线推论的2003年10月29日行星间CME的几何学.

sentences.en: Interplanetary missile attacks do not count towards the bashing rule.
sentences.cn: 星际导弹不计入过度攻击.

sentences.en: Interplanetary quarantine will be much more difficult to enforce once humans reach Mars.
sentences.cn: 一旦人类到达了火星,星际检疫会变得困难得多.

sentences.en: Mars - 500 is the 3 rd in a series of interplanetary interplanetary flight simulations, the.
sentences.cn: 火星 -500 实验是星际飞行模拟系列的第三个试验.

sentences.en: Mars - 500 is the 3 rd theories in a series of inter fly interplanetary flight simulations.
sentences.cn: 火星500在行星间模拟飞行系列的第三个实验.

sentences.en: Moons can now attacked with interplanetary rockets. Anti - Ballistic Missiles of the planet will defend the moon.
sentences.cn: 月球现在可以被星际导弹攻击, 月球所在星球的 反 弹道导弹将会保卫月球.

sentences.en: The cosmic rocket carrying an automatic interplanetary station snot off into cosmic space.
sentences.cn: 宇宙火箭带着自动星际站飞快冲向宇宙空间.

sentences.en: The remnant nebular gas pervades the interplanetary space.
sentences.cn: 星云的残余气体充斥星际空间.
